title.rendered: [Apple MFi Certified] iPhone Charger 0.3m, 3 Pack 0.3m Short Lightning Charger Cable, High-Speed iPhone Cord with…

content.rendered:
Size Name:0.3m | Colour Name:Black

Compatible Devices
For full charging and syncing, this cable works with units which have a Lightning port,Compatible with iPhone XS, iPhone XS Max, iPhone XR, iPhone X, iPhone 8 Plus, iPhone 8, iPhone 7 Plus, iPhone 7, iPhone 6s, iPhone 6, iPhone 6s Plus, iPhone 6 Plus, iPhone 5C, iPhone 5S, iPhone 5, iPad Air / Air 2, iPad mini / mini 2 / mini 3, iPod nano (seventh technology), and iPod contact (fifth technology). It’s appropriate with the most recent iOS 9.

Introducing CyvenSmart Lightning Cable:
Are you uninterested in shopping for charging cords time and again?
Are you MFi Certified
mfi’s third-party certification ensures complete compatibility with any mfi gadget which makes use of a Lightning connector.

WHAT IS MFi ?
MFi is a form of categorical license for exterior equipment produced by licensed accent producers. It is the abbreviation of ‘Made for iPhone / iPod / iPad’.
The certification take a look at course of is extraordinarily demanding, with a move price of solely 2%.
mfionly offers service for mfi hosts for MFi-certified equipment.

Fast Data Transfer
Supports knowledge switch at a velocity of as much as 480 Mbps by way of USB.

Nylon Braided Lightning to USB A Cable
Fully appropriate with iPhone 11/11 professional/X / XS / XR / XS Max / 8 Plus / 8 / 7 Plus / 7 / 6s Plus / 6s / 6 Plus / 6 / 5s / 5c / 5 / iPad Pro / iPad Air / iPad mini / iPad 4th gen / iPod Touch fifth gen / iPod nano seventh gen with out security or knowledge issues.

Stronger for Longer
Lasts 5x longer than customary cables, confirmed with stand up to the take a look at of time.

Add it to your cart with no any threat now!


Make positive this suits by coming into your mannequin quantity.
【Durable Design】 Black Spring iPhone Lightning Charger cable with a examined 10000+ bend lifespan,the Lightning cables are extra sturdy,bendable,wear-resistant and pull-resistant.
【Premium Material】Tangle-free nylon braided cable jacket and aluminum metallic shell design make sure the service lifetime of the iPhone charging wire, which is powerful and immune to pulling. In day by day use, you possibly can bend the cable at will with out worrying about harm.
【Reinforced Joint Design】Nylon Braided iPhone charger cable 10ft with strengthened joint design, cables have been examined to bend 95-degrees 10,000 occasions, can stand up to repeated bending and pulling with out breaking.
【Compatible With】Compatible With Apple iPhone 11/11Pro/11Max / X XS Max XR / 8 / 8 Plus / 7 / 7 Plus / 6s Plus / 6s / 6 Plus / 6 / SE / 5s / 5c / 5 / iPad Pro / iPad Air / Air 2 / iPad mini / mini 2 / mini 4 / iPad 4th gen / iPod Touch fifth gen / iPod nano seventh gen.
【What You Get】 0.3m iPhone charger cable*3.
(*3*)
